constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: KEYACH Name: Key Area of Change
NEIGH Name: South of the Borough
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

description: Demolition of existing detached rear garage and erection of single storey rear outbuilding for use as office/store
decision_conditions: The demolition of existing detached rear garage and erection of single storey rear outbuilding for use as office/store falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class E of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

Your attention is drawn to the need to comply with the relevant provisions of the Building Regulations, the Building Acts and other related legislation.  These cover such works as  - the demolition of existing buildings, the erection of a new building or structure, the extension or alteration to a building, change of use of buildings, installation of services, underpinning works, and fire safety/means of escape works.  Notice of intention to demolish existing buildings must be given to the Council's Building Control Service at least 6 weeks before work starts.  A completed application form together with detailed plans must be submitted for approval before any building work is commenced.
Please provide a copy of a site location plan scaled 1:1250 with the application site outlined in red, showing at least two road frontages and a North point.

Inspection:Site inspection carried out as a desktop exercise with information provided by the applicant as supporting material to application.Assessment:Appropriate works to reduce and maintain including the removal of certain risks in high target areas in the interests of health and safety.Recommendation:Approve.
